articles.title: Magic pull away, beat Celtics despite another big Jaylen Brown game: 8 takeaways
articles.description:
Boston gave up 38 and 39 in the first and fourth quarters, respectively.

The post Magic pull away, beat Celtics despite another big Jaylen Brown game: 8 takeaways appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics lost to the Magic, allowing 39 points in the fourth quarter.
Jaylen Brown scored 38 points, continuing his strong performance this season.
Boston's defense struggles raise concerns ahead of upcoming home games.
